about_the_game:
"Survive till 100 years old" - A Unique Survival Game Blending Match-3 Gameplay and Strategic Challenges

Embark on a journey of humor and crisis as you experience the struggle to "live to 100 years old" in this exciting game that combines classic match-3 mechanics with survival strategy.

Core Gameplay

Players must utilize classic match-3 gameplay to gather essential resources to maintain nutrition, stay healthy, and acquire skills. These resources will aid you in overcoming various challenges as you progress through life, ensuring you can "survive" for as long as possible in the game.

Random Events and Increasing Difficulty

As your character ages, the game’s difficulty gradually escalates. From initial illnesses and accidents to mounting pressures and temptations, you’ll face an array of obstacles that test your strategy and decision-making skills. These challenges may disrupt your plans, requiring meticulous planning at every step, as one wrong move could lead to a complete failure!

A Duel of Strategy and Luck

The game demands sharp planning abilities while introducing an element of unpredictable luck. Successfully surviving to the age of 100 is not only a testament to your wisdom but also a stroke of good fortune.

Game Features

  • A Perfect Blend of Match-3 and Survival Simulation

  • Random Event System: Enhances replayability and adds challenging unpredictability, with a variety of achievements waiting for you to unlock.

  • Aging Mechanism: Realistically mirrors life’s challenges as you grow older.

  • Life Elements Collection: Gather 17 unique elements, 40+ events, to complete your growth chart.

  • Beautiful Graphics and a Relaxed Gameplay Style

Developer Tips:

• Be sure to check the encyclopedia regularly to understand the role and impact of each element on life activities.

• In the early stages of life, ensuring proper nutrition is the most important, and when element variety is limited, try to complete 4-matches or 5-matches whenever possible.

• Some important growth events only occur when you make a wish on your birthday.

• Not all growth events have a positive impact.

Are you ready for the ultimate test of wit, strategy, and luck? In "Survive till 100 years old", every game is a brand-new adventure!

name: Survive till 100 years old

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: null
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 11
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: How hard is it to "survive" to 100? This match-3 strategy game brings the answer with fun and challenges! In the game, players must use match-3 mechanics to gain nutrition, maintain health, and acquire skills to survive. Wisdom and strategy might help you achieve the goal, but luck is indispensable!
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
